mapper.update: update event_scene_type set EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NBR = #{evtSceneTypeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NAME = #{evtSceneTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR_EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID = #{parEvtSceneTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_DESC = #{evtSceneTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID = #{evtSceneTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NBR, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_scene_type where EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID = #{evtSceneTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NBR, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_EVT_SCENE_TYPE_ID, EVT_SCENE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_scene_type
